Heraldy Symbol Meaning Glossary

Eros, mauris nulla odio fermentum lectus porttitor iaculis. Curabitur dictum hendrerit est hendrerit. Sociis interdum varius ac non eget massa eget diam. Vel id hendrerit a nisl arcu tempor urna sed eu et arcu.

  • Adder

    Amongst the natural objects depicted on a coat of arms, trees feature frequently, either in whole or as individual branches and leaves or fruit. 1. The acorn, often represented in its early state as vert (green) 2 can be associated of course with the mighty oak, signifying, according to Wade, “antiquity and strength”, for obvious reasons.
